text: Effie Géraldine Mackie was a female Canadian speed skater. She lived in Toronto. She was Canadian U18 speed skating champion. She competed in all the three women's speed skating events at the 1932 Winter Olympics in Lake Placid, which were held as demonstration sport. She finished fourth in the 1500 metres event, and fifth in the 1000 metres event. She also competed in the 500 metres event but was eliminated in the heats. During her career she competed in several other international competitions where she was successful, including at the 1929 Middle Atlantic Senior SpeedSkating Championship for Girls. == References == Category:Canadian speed skaters
title: Géraldine Mackie
